case_title: MUHAMMAD YAQOOB vs PROVINCE OF SINDH through Secretary Home Department, Karachi and 7 others
respondents: Province of Sindh through Secretary Home Department, Karachi

contentions: Impugned Order should be set aside.
Temporary custody should be granted to the petitioner.
Respondent No.6 should file guardianship proceedings.
Mother is entitled to custody under Hizanat.
Sessions Judge empowered to grant temporary custody.

legal_principles: Mother's preferential right to Hizanat until puberty for female child.
Section 491, Cr.P.C. provides temporary custody relief.
Guardians and Wards Court determines final custody.
notes: Observations are tentative and do not impact other proceedings.
